headline: 5 years ago, Apple became the first to reach a $2T market cap
summary: It's been five years since Apple's (AAPL) market capitalization hit $2 trillion, when the iPhone maker was the first company to achieve the milestone. Yahoo Finance Tech Editor Dan Howley sits down with Josh Lipton on Asking for a Trend to take a closer look at Apple's ascent and the company's performance in the past five years. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Axinn Welcomes Former DOJ Antitrust Division Leader Jacklin Chou Lem to San Francisco Antitrust Practice
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 19, 2025--Axinn, Veltrop & Harkrider LLP announced today that Jacklin "Jackie" Lem, who most recently served as Civil Chief of the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) Antitrust Division’s San Francisco Office, has joined its Antitrust practice as a partner in the San Francisco, CA office.

headline: SiFly Shatters Guinness World Record with 3-Hour Electric Drone Flight
summary: SiFly, a leading developer of long-endurance electric unmanned aerial systems, announced today that it has officially broken the Guinness World Record for the longest duration flight of an electrically powered prototype multirotor/drone (5 - 20 kg). Conducted on July 26, 2025, at Amaral Ranches in California's Salinas Valley, the record-setting Q12 drone flight eclipsed the previous benchmark by nearly an hour, cementing SiFly's position at the forefront of next-generation aerial technology.

raw.headline: SiFly Shatters Guinness World Record with 3-Hour Electric Drone Flight
raw.summary: SiFly, a leading developer of long-endurance electric unmanned aerial systems, announced today that it has officially broken the Guinness World Record for the longest duration flight of an electrically powered prototype multirotor/drone (5 - 20 kg). Conducted on July 26, 2025, at Amaral Ranches in California's Salinas Valley, the record-setting Q12 drone flight eclipsed the previous benchmark by nearly an hour, cementing SiFly's position at the forefront of next-generation aerial technology.

headline: Amazon Shares Lag Behind in Stock Market Obsessed with AI
summary: The company’s shares have been lagging the Nasdaq 100 Index for most of the year, and the gap has only widened in the two weeks since Amazon’s July 31 earnings disappointment.  The tech-heavy benchmark is up nearly 13% this year, more than twice Amazon’s 5.5% gain.  Amazon is trading at about 26 times forward earnings estimates, compared with more than 27 times for the Nasdaq 100.

raw.headline: Amazon Shares Lag Behind in Stock Market Obsessed with AI
raw.summary: The company’s shares have been lagging the Nasdaq 100 Index for most of the year, and the gap has only widened in the two weeks since Amazon’s July 31 earnings disappointment.  The tech-heavy benchmark is up nearly 13% this year, more than twice Amazon’s 5.5% gain.  Amazon is trading at about 26 times forward earnings estimates, compared with more than 27 times for the Nasdaq 100.

headline: Xiaomi’s Revenue Rises 31% After Second EV Fires Up Consumers
summary: Xiaomi delivered 81,302 cars in the second quarter, taking the total to more than 157,000 over the first half — on track to surpass 2024’s haul.  Strong demand for the YU7 sport utility vehicle, which co-founder Lei Jun released at the end of June, is propelling Xiaomi’s $10 billion gamble on a fast-growing but crowded EV arena.
